verses.verse: שִׁ֗יר <WH7892> Shir, A Song הַֽמַּ֫עֲל֥וֹת <WH4609> ham-Ma-'a-Lot of degrees אַ֭שְׁרֵי <WH835> 'Ash-rei Blessed כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- is everyone יְרֵ֣א <WH3373> ye-Re [is] every one that feareth יְהוָ֑ה <WH3069> Yah-weh; God הַ֝הֹלֵ֗ךְ <WH1980> ha-ho-Lech, that walketh בִּדְרָכָֽיו׃ <WH1870> bid-ra-Chav. in his ways

יְגִ֣יעַ <WH3018> ye-Gi-a' the labour כַּ֭פֶּיךָ <WH3709> Kap-pei-cha of thine hands כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki When תֹאכֵ֑ל <WH398> to-Chel; For thou shalt eat אַ֝שְׁרֶ֗יךָ <WH835> 'ash-Rei-cha, happy וְט֣וֹב <WH2896> ve-Tov [shalt] thou [be] and [it shall be] well לָֽךְ׃ Lach.

אֶשְׁתְּךָ֤׀ <WH802> 'esh-te-Cha Thy wife כְּגֶ֥פֶן <WH1612> ke-Ge-fen vine פֹּרִיָּה֮ <WH6509> po-ri-Yah [shall be] as a fruitful בְּיַרְכְּתֵ֪י <WH3411> be-yar-ke-Tei by the sides בֵ֫יתֶ֥ךָ <WH1004> vei-Te-cha of thine house בָּ֭נֶיךָ <WH1121> Ba-nei-cha thy children כִּשְׁתִלֵ֣י <WH8363> kish-ti-Lei plants זֵיתִ֑ים <WH2132> zei-Tim; like olive סָ֝בִ֗יב <WH5439> sa-Viv, round about לְשֻׁלְחָנֶֽךָ׃ <WH7979> le-shul-cha-Ne-cha. thy table

הִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> hin-Neh Behold כִי־ <WH3588> chi- for כֵ֭ן <WH3651> chen thus יְבֹ֥רַךְ <WH1288> ye-Vo-rach be blessed גָּ֗בֶר <WH1397> Ga-ver, Behold that thus shall the man יְרֵ֣א <WH3373> ye-Re that feareth יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. the LORD

יְבָרֶכְךָ֥ <WH1288> ye-va-rech-Cha shall bless יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh The LORD מִצִּ֫יּ֥וֹן <WH6726> mitz-Tzi-Yon thee out of Zion וּ֭רְאֵה <WH7200> U-re-'eh and thou shalt see בְּט֣וּב <WH2898> be-Tuv the good יְרוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> ye-ru-sha-Lim; of Jerusalem כֹּ֝֗ל <WH3605> Kol, all יְמֵ֣י <WH3117> ye-Mei all the days חַיֶּֽיךָ׃ <WH2416> chai-Yei-cha. of thy life

וּרְאֵֽה־ <WH7200> u-re-'eh- Yea thou shalt see בָנִ֥ים <WH1121> va-Nim thy children's לְבָנֶ֑יךָ <WH1121> le-va-Nei-cha; children שָׁ֝ל֗וֹם <WH7965> Lom, [and] peace עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- be upon יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El. upon Israel
